summary: This bill, the Southwestern Power Administration Fund Establishment Act, establishes a fund in the Treasury of the United States.  The fund will be comprised of receipts from the Southwestern Power Administration, appropriations, and transfers from existing funds.  The Secretary of Energy, through the Administrator, will use the fund for operating and maintaining power transmission facilities, marketing power, constructing infrastructure, and related administrative expenses.  Excess funds will be annually transferred to the Treasury. The bill also includes conforming amendments to related legislation.
